What is Risk of Rain?

Risk of Rain is an action platformer/adventure game with randomized elements.While we donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t want to spoil the story, we can let a few things through! The game is set in the distant future, where space transportation is common. Space trains carry passengers and goods all across space. A particular space train, however, had some very special cargo. Through a series of unfortunate events, this space train gets shot out of orbit and crash lands on a mysterious planet.. with one survivor.

Install Notes

1.Unpack. + hit _setup.bat
2.Run It
3.Enjoy

To add music
1.Move Audio to gamedir + overwrite all
2.Run It
3.Enjoy
